forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle. Partly cloudy, with a low around 59. West southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As the clock ticks past the early hours of dawn, Downtown San Francisco awakens to the lingering touch of drizzle, painting the streets with a soft sheen. The skies exhibit a patchy character, where clouds play coyly with the sun, hinting at what later may reveal itself—a day that dances between the muted grays of morning and the promise of clarity to come. Residents can expect a gradual transformation, with the sun breaking free shortly after the morning drizzle recedes, nudging temperatures towards a comfortable high.

In the transition that awaits, the city will don a predominantly sunny disposition, suggesting an invitation to step outdoors. As you consider your attire, think layers—perhaps a light jacket that can be shed as warmth emerges while strolling along the waterfront or looping through the parks that cradle the heart of this vibrant city. With winds flowing softly from the southwest, a gentle breeze will keep the atmosphere refreshing against the sunlit backdrop. Today’s charm lies in its casual allure, perfect for an afternoon spent exploring local cafés or casual meetups in one of the urban vistas the city is known for, soaking in the energy of a San Francisco Saturday.
